Epic: As a SMB I want to add details on my Insurance so that I can keep track of it on my business profile and be reminding on important dates and tasks
Epic: As a SMB I want to add details on Technology & Social Media so that I can keep track of it on my business profile and be reminding on important dates and tasks
Epic: As a SMB I want to add details on Professional Consultants so that I can keep track of it on my business profile and be reminding on important dates and tasks
Epic: As a SMB I want to add details on Employees so that I can keep track of them on my business profile and be reminding on important dates and tasks
Epic: As a SMB I want to add details on my AR & Customers so that I can keep track of it on my business profile and be reminding on important dates and tasks
Epic: As a SMB I want I want to add details on my AP & Vendors so that I can keep track of it on my business profile and be reminding on important dates and tasks

user_stories.action: to manage my account details
user_stories.result: I can keep them up to date

user_stories.action: to be able to get help on the app
user_stories.result: my needs or questions can be answered

user_stories.action: log out from my account
user_stories.result: I'm no longer logged in

user_stories.action: to log in with my email
user_stories.result: I can access my account

user_stories.action: to reset my password
user_stories.result: if I forget my current password, I can regain access to my account

user_stories.action: to be able to request the luxury tier
user_stories.result: I can ride in comfort and style

acceptance_criterions.description: Verify that luxury tier is available anywhere when I need it

user_stories.action: to add a different credit card than the one I added during registration
user_stories.result: I can use a different method if I need to do so.

user_stories.action: to see my past history of rides I have taken
user_stories.result: I can track expenses and remember what I prefer.

user_stories.action: to select a location for home
user_stories.result: I can select it quickly when requesting a ride.

user_stories.action: to confirm my request for a vehicle
user_stories.result: Uber will send my car.

user_stories.action: to cancel the reqest for a car
user_stories.result: I can change my mind if necessary.

user_stories.action: to add my mobile phone number
user_stories.result: my driver can contact me about my ride.

user_stories.action: to user my phone's camera to take a picture of my credit card
user_stories.result: I don't have to type in the information.

user_stories.action: to edit my account
user_stories.result: I can change my information.

user_stories.action: to edit my email
user_stories.result: I can update it if it has changed.

user_stories.action: to put in the location I wish to travel to
user_stories.result: I can request a vehicle.

user_stories.action: to see where the car is in relation to me
user_stories.result: I have an idea of how far it is from me.

user_stories.action: to update my picture
user_stories.result: a picture shows on my profile.

user_stories.action: to edit my mobile number
user_stories.result: drivers can call the correct number to reach me.

user_stories.action: to add my credit card
user_stories.result: I can pay for my ride.

user_stories.action: to sign up for an account using my email
user_stories.result: I can request a ride.

user_stories.action: to locate the user through geolocation
user_stories.result: I can show them if there are any available cars in their area.

user_stories.action: to send a verification code to a newly registered user
user_stories.result: I can make sure they are not a spammer/scammer.

user_stories.action: to give feedback to my driver
user_stories.result: they are aware of my experience with the driver.

user_stories.action: to view the receipt when the ride is completed
user_stories.result: I know how much is being charged to my payment method.

user_stories.action: to send promotion codes to other users
user_stories.result: I can get a free ride.

user_stories.action: to see how many cars are available near me
user_stories.result: I can plan my trip.

user_stories.action: to calculate the price of a route based on mileage and pricing
user_stories.result: the passenger can see the estimates for their route.

user_stories.action: to enter rates based on system demand
user_stories.result: I can properly estimate the price for a trip.

user_stories.action: to select text messages to receive information about my ride
user_stories.result: I can receive information quickly.

user_stories.action: to calculate the ideal route between the start and end of a trip
user_stories.result: I can calculate mileage.

user_stories.action: to input the verification code sent to me
user_stories.result: I can use the service.

user_stories.action: to click on a specific ride
user_stories.result: I can view the receipt from it.

user_stories.action: to download the application
user_stories.result: I can request a car.

user_stories.action: to see how much time it will take for the car to reach me
user_stories.result: I am ready to go when it arrives.

user_stories.action: to see who my driver will be
user_stories.result: I can view their information and feedback.

user_stories.action: to send the user an email to verify their email address when it is added or updated in the system
user_stories.result: I can be sure they are a real person.

user_stories.action: to enter promotion codes I have received
user_stories.result: I can get a free ride.

user_stories.action: to see the route that will be taken between my pickup and my destination
user_stories.result: I can see what the cost is based on.

user_stories.action: to access my settings
user_stories.result: I can change or update information.

user_stories.action: to see the full list of notifications that I have received within the app
user_stories.result: I do not miss anything that has been sent to me.

user_stories.action: to select whether to allow push notifications
user_stories.result: I can receive information quickly.

user_stories.action: to use an image of a credit card to acquire the needed credit card information for payment
user_stories.result: the payment can go through when a user requests a ride.

user_stories.action: to enter my password to verify access to my settings
user_stories.result: I can update my information.

user_stories.action: to cancel out of editing my profile
user_stories.result: I do not make any changes I don't want or need to.

user_stories.action: to edit my name
user_stories.result: I can change it to whatever I need it to be.

user_stories.action: to retrieve my password
user_stories.result: I can verify my account information.

user_stories.action: to select a location for work
user_stories.result: I can select it quickly when requesting a ride.

user_stories.action: to get help
user_stories.result: I can resolve any issues I might have.
